label.desc: The label text for the breadcrumb.

icon.desc: The name of the icon, should you want one in front of the label.

exact.desc: Match the exact route specified (and not its children) when adding router-link-active CSS class.

append.desc: Append route definition to current route when navigating.

replace.desc: Replaces the current route with the new one instead of adding it to the window history queue.

isExactActiveRoute.desc: Returns true, if the element being tested is the exact active route/ breadcrumb.

el.desc: The element to test, if it's the exact active route/ breadcrumb.

isActiveRoute.desc: Returns true, if the element being tested is the active route/ breadcrumb.

el.desc: The element to test, if it's the active route/ breadcrumb.
